titles: Saint Chrysostome his Parænesis, or Admonition wherein hee recalls Theodorus the fallen. Or generally an exhortation for desperate sinners. / Translated by the Lord Viscount Grandison prisoner in the Tower.
author: John Chrysostum, Saint, d. 407.
Grandison, William Villiers, Viscount, 1614-1643.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Dring at the signe of the George near Cliffords Inne in Fleet-Street.,
notes: A translation, by William Villiers, Viscount Grandison, of: Saint John Chrysostom.  Parænesis.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Theodorus, --  the fallen --  Early works to 1800.
